text: Helen Grayco (born Helen Greco; September 20, 1924 - August 20, 2022) was an American pop singer and actress. She was most famous for appearances with her husband Spike Jones on The Spike Jones Show in the 1950s and the 1960s. She was also the mother of producer and Emmy recipient, Spike Jones Jr. and Leslie Ann Jones, a Grammy Award-winning recording engineer. Grayco died on August 20, 2022 in Los Angeles, California, one month before her 98th birthday.Helen Grayco, R.I.P. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American pop singers Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Singers from Tacoma, Washington Category:Actors from Tacoma, Washington
title: Helen Grayco
